summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to rates and charges for water services of Seattle Public Utilities; revising water rates and charges and amending Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 21.04 in connection therewith; removing Water District 61 and Richmond Beach Area meter surcharges and amending Seattle Municipal Code 21.12 in connection therewith; and revising credits to low-income customers and amending Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 21.76 in connection therewith.
note: Originally referred to Seattle Public Utilities and Neighborhoods Committee on 7/18/11.
committee_vote: 8 (Bagshaw, Burgess, Clark, Godden, Harrell, Licata, O'Brien, Rasmussen) - 0
